Synchronous acquisition API
[Level 2 API]

 Perform a synchronous acquisition write operation.

Function Documentation

int comedi_sync_read ( comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
unsigned int  idx_subd,
unsigned int  chan_desc,
unsigned int  ns_delay,
void *  buf,
size_t  nbyte 
)

Perform a synchronous acquisition read operation.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() (and optionally comedi_fill_desc())
[in] idx_subd Index of the concerned subdevice
[in] chan_desc Channel descriptor (channel, range and reference)
[in] ns_delay Optional delay (in nanoseconds) to wait between the setting of the input channel and sample(s) acquisition(s).
[in] buf Input buffer
[in] nbyte Number of bytes to read
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise a negative error code.

References COMEDI_INSN_READ, COMEDI_INSN_WAIT, comedi_snd_insn(), comedi_snd_insnlist(), comedi_instruction::data, and comedi_instruction::data_size.

int comedi_sync_write ( comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
unsigned int  idx_subd,
unsigned int  chan_desc,
unsigned int  ns_delay,
void *  buf,
size_t  nbyte 
)

Perform a synchronous acquisition write operation.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() (and optionally comedi_fill_desc())
[in] idx_subd Index of the concerned subdevice
[in] chan_desc Channel descriptor (channel, range and reference)
[in] ns_delay Optional delay (in nanoseconds) to wait between the setting of the input channel and sample(s) acquisition(s).
[in] buf Output buffer
[in] nbyte Number of bytes to write
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise a negative error code.

References COMEDI_INSN_WAIT, COMEDI_INSN_WRITE, comedi_snd_insn(), comedi_snd_insnlist(), comedi_instruction::data, and comedi_instruction::data_size.
